channel.title: Alberta Emergency Alert - Current
channel.description: Alerts and Warnings from Alberta Emergency Alert

item.title: Test Alert - Province Wide Test - Nov 28, 2018 at 01:55PM
item.description:
** Sent to compatible devices in the affected area as a wireless Emergency Alert **

This is an Alberta Emergency Alert. Alberta Emergency Management Agency has issued a Province Wide Test Alert. This alert is in effect for: Alberta. This is only a TEST. If this had been an actual emergency or threat, you would now hear instructions that would assist you to protect you and your family. For details visit www.emergencyalert.alberta.ca or stay tuned to local media.
item.dc:creator: Alberta Emergency Management Agency
